MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 27-NOV-2020 16:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: Following the emergency shutdown in the SY15 and SY16 postcode areas of Aberbechan and Abermule , affecting properties in Pont Bechan and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a broken piece of equipment on our overhead line network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:11 PM on 27th November 2020..
